 import { Component, Input, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Movie } from '../../models/movie'; @Component({ selector: 'movie-item', templateUrl: './movie-item.component.html', styleUrls: ['./movie-item.component.scss'] }) export class MovieItemComponent implements OnInit { @Input() itemData!: Movie; constructor() {} ngOnInit(): void {} }
